Package com.cmput301.cs.project.activities

All activities for the app

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CalendarActivity
    Activity for picking a date.
    CalendarActivity.Builder
    Helper class to assist passing in the keys to CalendarActivity.
    ClaimListActivity
    Is the activity that launches at start of app.
    ClaimViewActivity
    The activity that is called when a item is clicked within ClaimListActivity that shows the specific details of that claim.
    CommentActivity
    Comment activity returns a result with a comment in the intent as CommentActivity.COMMENT_TEXT Used as an approver to add comments when returning and approving
    CommentListActivity
    Lists all comments and their authors.
    EditClaimActivity
    The activity that is called when a New Claim is created or when an existing claim is going to be edited.
    EditDestinationActivity
    An activity that allows a destination to be created with an associated reason.
    EditExpenseActivity
    An activity that is called when a new expense is created or when a expense is being edited from within ExpenseListActivity.
    ExpenseListActivity
    An activity that shows a list of all Expenses associated with a Claim.
    ExpenseViewActivity
    An activity that shows the details of an Expense.
    LoginActivity
    An activity that is called when the app starts with no user currently 'logged in'.
    MapActivity
    Map activity returns a result with a destination packaged in the intent as MapActivity.KEY_DESTINATION

    It allows a user to select a place on the map or enter the place name in a text box
    MapActivity.ErrorDialogFragment  
    SettingsActivity
    Allows a user to choose a home location using a MapActivity
    TagEditActivity
    An activity that is called when a new tag is created or a tag is clicked on TagManagerActivity.
    TagManagerActivity
    An activity that shows a list of Tags that can be clicked to be edited.
